goal.ch: 使學生理解基礎的材料冶金現象、成分與性質的分析、材料缺陷結構、金屬製造技術與原理、近代先進材料的基礎原理與材料特性。

content.ch:
"Chapter 1: The Structure of Metals
?Chapter 2: Characterization Techniques
?Chapter 3: Crystal Binding
?Chapter 4: Introduction to Dislocations
?Chapter 5: Dislocations and Plastic Deformation
?Chapter 6: Elements of Grain Boundaries
?Chapter 7: Vacancies
?Chapter 8: Annealing
?Chapter 9: Solid Solutions
Chapter 10-13: Phase Diagrams & Diffusion
Ch1~Ch9為本課程主要核心內容。
補充教材: 近代晶體材料之合成與應用、奈米材料、光電材料、複合材料、缺陷與機械強度等
實作觀摩: 奈米材料合成與分析"

textbook.en: "Physical Metallurgy Principles, Fourth Edition,Reza Abbaschian, Lara Abbaschian, Robert E. Reed-Hill"
textbook.ch: "Physical Metallurgy Principles, Fourth Edition,Reza Abbaschian, Lara Abbaschian, Robert E. Reed-Hill"

grading.en: Midterm: 30 percent Final exam: 40% Attendance (or quiz)+ homework: 30%
grading.ch: 期中考: 30 % 期末考: 40 % 出席率(或小考)+作業: 30 %

flex_desc.en:
One week will be planned to visit the laboratory: crystal synthesis and analysis technology, so that students can understand the production and characteristics of crystal materials in class.
Another week, for the planning of the course buffer, as a supplementary material explanation, etc.
flex_desc.ch:
一周將規劃實驗室參訪:晶體合成與分析技術，使同學理解課堂上晶體材料的製作與其特性。
另一周，為規劃課程緩衝，作為補充資料講解等使用。

en.competency: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation
